overview: Popcorn, Pillow Fights, And Death!  Tina is throwing a party, a slumber party. All the girls are invited. They'll watch movies, talk about boys, play truth or dare, have pillow fights and if they're lucky survive. Because little do they know escaped serial killer Leroy Ravenstock has decided to crash this adolescent shindig, and boy does he have an axe to grind.
tagline: This party will leave you sleepless!
title: Slumber Party Murder Mania
